definition: to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]

sentences.english: I still want to respond the comment 4 even though my comment might be a little irrelevant.
sentences.chinese: 雖然有點偏題，但是還是想回應一下4號評論。
